message:
We are using ConfigureAwait(false) to solve performance issues, not to avoid deadlocks. (async all the way down)  
When using ConfigureAwait(false) speed has improved a lot (4+ times faster)

Based on your answer:  
Does it mean that when I want to optimze some async method that doesn't need the context, I need to use ConfigureAwait(false) on all methods all the way down the call stack?   
That would be very hard to maintain.

Is there a way to avoid that?

Thank you,
